body: Astolfo why are you cheating on me

@OneFilthyWeeb, could've been one doujinshi. We would've been waiting for a translation for possibly for months in the end.  Perhaps a complied anthology would be nice however things are nice as they are. We get translations relatively quickly because they're bite size pieces!

@wabu cope

Man, he really likes to milk whatever theme he catches till it's run dry, huh? This, among his previous 10 or so works could have been full doujins, Like, one doujin for astolfo where fucks all of chaldea, and another for Gil and Alexander where they also fuck all of Chaldea.. Done and dusted, move along to the next topic. But I beg to differ.
never thought this gonna happen, please 20+ pages of sequel. haha
Probably the best one out of the Astolfo series so far, love it!
Ankoman pls for the love of god just make a hentai that is 20 pages long or more, it would be appreciated
